newsitem.title: UK: RESEARCH ALERT- JP Morgan cuts Hydro. [CORRECTED 15:40 GMT]
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT- JP Morgan cuts Hydro. [CORRECTED 15:40 GMT]

text.p: (Corrects the headline and the first paragraph to make clear that the firm was JP Morgan, and not Morgan Stanley.)
Norsk Hydro was cut to "market performer" at JP Morgan, the investment bank said on Tuesday.
Earnings per share forecasts were also cut to 30.1 crowns from 35.1 crowns for 1997 and to 32.7 crowns from 35.3 crowns for the year after.
The investment bank cuts its 1997 dividend forecast to 8.0 crowns from 9.0 and to 9.0 crowns from 10.5 for the year after.
